_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: n8n
author: contact@mail.bill-zhanxg.com
description: n8n is a workflow automation tool that allows you to connect different services and applications visually.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# n8n Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "true" ] || [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "1" ]; then
    echo -e "Assuming the user knows what they are doing."
    exit 0
fi

# Creating the required directories
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.n8n

echo -e "Installation completed. The Docker image already contains all necessary files."
exit 0

variables.name: n8n version
variables.description: Version of n8n (must match the version of the Docker image).

variables.name: User Uploaded Files
variables.description: Bypasses the standard installation process. 0 = disabled (default), 1 = enabled

variables.name: Database Type
variables.description: Database type to use. Values: sqlite, postgresdb

variables.name: Timezone
variables.description: Time zone for the server. Ex: America/Sao_Paulo

variables.name: Hostname
variables.description: The hostname to access n8n externally (for webhooks)

variables.name: Encryption Key
variables.description: Encryption key for sensitive data (recommended definer)

variables.name: Basic Auth
variables.description: Enable basic authentication. true or false

variables.name: N8N_SECURE_COOKIE
variables.description: Requires cookies to be sent only over HTTPS. Set to 'false' if using HTTP.

variables.name: Protocol
variables.description: Protocol to use to access n8n (http or https)

variables.name: Enforce Settings File Permissions
variables.description: Apply secure permissions to configuration files

variables.name: Enable Task Runners
variables.description: Enable task runners (recommended for future releases)
